title: Arrive Point smart mailboxes free up hospital staffers for patient care
description:
Arrive AI’s Arrive Point network integrates robots and drones to provide secure, autonomous, and temperature-controlled deliveries.

The post Arrive Point smart mailboxes free up hospital staffers for patient care appeared first on The Robot Report.
